revision.text: {| class="wikitable" ! State || Description |- | None || Base State. Pokémon can contract Pokérus. Pokémon cannot gain EVs. |- | [[File:Pokérus (infected).png|20px]] Infected || Pokémon has contracted Pokérus, but has yet to hatch once after contracting the virus. Pokémon cannot gain EVs. |- | [[File:Pokérus (contagious).png|20px]] Contagious || Pokémon has contracted Pokérus, and is capable of spreading the virus. Pokémon can gain EVs. |- | [[File:Pokérus (cured).png|20px]] Cured || Pokémon has contracted Pokérus, and is capable of spreading the virus. Pokémon can gain EVs, and has also accumulated 50 or more EVs. |- |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
